  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085827</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Caucusing in the middle school classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Caucusing im Klassenzimmer der mittleren Schule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caucusing dans la salle de classe de collège</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caucusing na sala de aula da escola média</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caucusing nell'aula della scuola centrale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Caucusing στη μέση σχολική τάξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El caucusing en la sala de clase de la escuela 
media</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Caucusing enables students to practice the elements of responsible citizenship, including persuasive writing and speaking.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Caucusing aktiviert Kursteilnehmer, die Elemente 
der verantwortlichen Staatsbürgerschaft, einschließlich 
überzeugende Schreiben und das Sprechen zu üben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caucusing permet à des étudiants de pratiquer 
les éléments de la citoyenneté responsable, y compris l'écriture 
et parler persuasifs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caucusing permite estudantes de praticar os 
elementos do citizenship responsável, including a escrita e o 
discurso persuasive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caucusing permette agli allievi di esercitarsi 
negli elementi della cittadinanza responsabile, compreso scrittura e 
parlare convincenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Caucusing επιτρέπει στους σπουδαστές για να 
ασκήσει τα στοιχεία της αρμόδιας υπηκοότητας, συμπεριλαμβανομένου
του πειστικού γραψίματος και της ομιλίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El caucusing permite a estudiantes practicar los 
elementos de la ciudadanía responsable, incluyendo la escritura y el 
discurso persuasivos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
